title: love

There are many more bright spots in the film moved me, Mulan changed clothes, with the moving drum, Mulan cut off their hair, the top armour, from the sword out of her handsome face, riding a horse, howling out. Mulan in the barracks, through a night's effort, with a clever way to bite teeth to climb the flagpole. Because she is a daughter, so the training always can not keep up with the team, almost by the school lieutenant Li Xiang 'exhortation '. But she did not concede defeat, with a skillful way to climb the flagpole bit by bit, finally, in the morning sun, encouraged by the comrades who once hated each other, she climbed to the top, took off Li Xiang for all the soldiers set the first difficulty -- he shot the arrow. She proved herself with her cleverness and effort, as well as the recruits.
Flowers bloom in adversity are the most rare and beautiful! I love Mulan and look forward to the first edition.

title: like
review:
This is probably the loneliest movie I've ever seen. When sam had a video call with his family, saw his daughter who missed day and night Eve, and learned that his wife Tess had already died, he found that he had no home, no lover, no daughter, everything on earth had nothing to do with him, he lived only to create wealth, and and someone would replace him immediately. All the Sam sat paralyzed, looking at the earth 380000 kilometers away, tears streaming, repeated 'I want to go home, I want to go home.' But he never had a home. Loneliness is not alone, but you think that you live in other people's lives.I enjoy Gerty this setting. There was little affection for it at first, though it was always screaming Sam taking care of Sam food and drink. I thought it was just a talking robot that followed the set procedure and was always on the company side. When it helps Sam enter a password, helps Sam escape back to earth and asks Sam to erase its memory and restart it, when it says I just want to help you, I found out, like Sam said, he's not programmed. He's a flesh and blood man. Whether it's human cloning or robots, their choices are more tender than human beings, more like 'human '.
Giving AI or human cloning memories and feelings is really a cruel thing, hoping that humans can make good use of technology.
